General.name: Piedmont 3D Printing Club
General.description: I am the president and founder of the Piedmont High School 3D Printing Club. We fundraised for a printer through kickstarter.

Service.name: Fiji Community Service
Service.description: During the summer after my sophomore year, I spent three weeks in Fiji doing community service work, such as removing invasive species from coral reefs, cleaning up beach garbage, and repairing local schools. I was most impacted by the people of Fiji and their culture. Everyone I met seemed so happy, and I hope to bring that joy with me wherever I go.
